text:
...Hmm, a wedding venue promotion...
Sounds good~, with lots of beautiful flowers~...

And our new outfits are...
Wedding dresses~~!?

N-No...
I was just a bit surprised~

Maybe it's because I always thought I'd only wear
a wedding dress when I really get married.

Even if you know it's part of the job,
it's still surprising when it happens to you.

I was a bit taken aback,
but I really want to do this job!

I'll do my best so Producer thinks,
"There's no one better for a bride role!"
